tool.name: mmbios01
tool.description: Trains a generative model from a collection of simple geometries.
tool.help:
**Description**
Makes a collection of simple geometries and trains a framework model from that collection.
-----
**Input**
- Seed for pseudo-random generator. Default is 3. - Number of simple geometries to generate to train this simple model. Default is 25. - Simple geometries image size. Default is 256. - Downsample factor. Default is 1 (no downsample). It only downsamples the image in x-direction and y-direction, not z-direction.
-----
**Output**
A valid CellOrganizer model as a Matlab file.
